Description: Round-topped limestone stela divided into three registers: 1 - Wedjat-eyes and jackals. 2 - Four rows of Hieroglyphic text. 3 - Standing male figure and small kneeling female figure before offerings.
Bibliographic references: Scott-Moncrieff 1912 / Hieroglyphic texts from Egyptian stelae, etc., in the British Museum, Part 2. (pl.32)
